item.title: find player location in minecraft from picture
item.description: 1 Project philosophy In some case, speedrunners could watch a “secret” location from a specific seed on youtube video. In this case, they will need to find it to redo the speedrun method. In this tutorial, I will help you to find a speedrun location from a picture. The target I will use will be the next below. This project is a geoint methodology (tutorial) to find the coordinate (x,y) from a picture.
